title: Makus
author: Makus
content: My brothers I carry one update come wey go fit help reduce stress of adding special character for our post dem or thread, though some persons fit kick against am because dem dey write directly for this site, but this tactics na for those wey dey do their writing outside this forum den transfer am after dem don finish, because writting inside this forum some time go make you feel like make you give up some times.Reason I say so, this thing don happen to me many times, wen I don write enough thing to post sometimes my hand go mistakenly touch refresh and before you go know every thing don go, wen I give up to do my writing for this forum na wen I been dey translate one  fillippone thread I don almost Finnish naim the page refresh, omor I wan ves spoil my phone that day but i just hold myself because na only me for still face the consequences, so because of that one I com go download note pad wey get undo and redo should in case any mistake arise.So the update I dey carry come na like this, those wey dey write for digital note, na to just write all the most commonly used command for one page of the note then pin that one for the first page, for easy asses so when you wan use dem na to just go that place then copy am go paste for where you dey write.This na the way I arrange my command dem:Code:1. [b]  [/b]2. [url=  ]  [/url]3. [url] [/url]4. [quote] [/quote]5. [list]    [li] [/li]    [/list]6. [img width= height=] [/img]7. [code] etc[/code]So you fit copy the command go past for your note pad so that when you need am na to just extract am from there. This na image on how I take package my own.And also the fastest way to take edit your post na for this button wey dey for right bottom corner of our post,   na the image be that. E go make us make easier and faster edit to our post rather than using the main edit button.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: If you click on reply, or you quote, or you start a topic, you will see post, preview and draft just as it is in the below image:The preview has two functions which is to preview your post and it is like control s. If you continue to click on preview as you are writing, your post will be automatically saved and you can click on draft to see you saved preview contents which you can copy and paste.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I have had this experience several times and to be frank it sucks mate. It is not worth the experience of writing a very long and lengthy post and after which you mistakenly press the back key making you to loose all you have written. After that experience I decided to download sticky note for external typing and after I am done, I copy and paste on the platform for publication here. That is how I roll after then.For the code breakdown you have done, that is a good one on your side. One can copy them and keep on their notepad there so it could be accessible for them when ever they are writing things to be be posted here for reading.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.created_time: October 14, 2023, 12:38:33 AMLast edit: October 14, 2023, 12:52:19 AM by Samlucky O
comments.body: Sincerely speaking what just happened to me now just blew me up right now, could you imagine after drafting a message for one hour I just ended up selecting all and clicked a button and all vanished. I felt like biting my self just tired and decided to take a break. This is making it twice now. I think this thread is a useful thread. although most of this problem is caused by phone, expecialy when you touch screen is having a little malfunction. So my advice is that, bitcointalk typing keyboard might cause you repeatedly typing a particular thing, where as one have other things to do with time.  In this line of business you will understand that time is very useful. When you are fully dedicated here , every minute becomes useful and you will not want to miss any of it.So let's try and look for a secue way of typing to avoid waist of  time and energy.

comments.author: Cityhunter34
comments.body: Omor, we plenty wey dey get this same thing, I had my own share of it few days ago, after drafting out a post and I mistakenly hit the wrong button and the page just refresh like that, mehn that experience sucks so bad. But here's what I do now to make it easier for me, I write my post down in a book first before I type it in here ( some of y'all must be thinking that it's so much work but I enjoy doing it this way than to type here and hit the wrong button) and since writing is one of my hubbies it's fun for me.And also I downloaded a note pad app where I draft my post, read it twice or thrice and I copy and paste here.
